content: materials - 6 12 skeins of purl soho s fiddlehead 1 100% alpaca each skein is 65 yards/ 100 grams approximately 390 780 yards required we used the color black-eyed susan for the original version 2 and chocolate truffle desert gray heirloom white ocean air and pink azalea for our new versions note some colors may no longer be available - us 11 8 mm 47-inch circular needles 3 - a removable stitch marker 4 or scrap yarn gauge 9 stitches and 18 row = 4 inches in garter stitch sizes crib throw finished dimensions 30 inches wide x 36 inches long 38 inches wide x 54 inches long sample the ocean air and heirloom white blankets are the crib size and the black-eyed susan chocolate truffle desert gray and pink azalea blankets are the throw size designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 5 click here 6 to see even more of hiromi s work 1 https //www purlsoho com/fiddlehead html 2 https //www purlsoho com/create/2022/12/07/coziest-blanket-ever/ 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
